dct_description_sm: Shows most of the eastern hemisphere, omitting Japan, part of China, part of Africa, and polar regions. Relief shown pictorially. Map is surrounded on three sides by a chronological history, giving position of event on map; latest date is 1733. At bottom: 2 small hemispheres and 2 models of the solar system. Probably issued in: Historica auxilia ... / geschrieben von P. Anselmo Desing ... Sultzbach : Gedruckt bey Christian Holst, 1733-1734.
